title: $:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList
description: A more advanced task list for TiddlyWiki
author: inmysocks
text:
{ "tiddlers": { "$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/BasicFinishedEntryDisplayTemplate": { "caption": "Basic Finished Entry Display Template", "created": "20141204051456012", "display_name": "Basic Finished Entry", "modified": "20141206181105485", "no_edit": "true", "settings_tiddler": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/BasicFinishedTaskDisplayTemplateSettings", "tags": "Templates ToDoEntryDisplayTemplate", "title": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/BasicFinishedEntryDisplayTemplate", "text": "<$checkbox tag="done"> ~~<$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/>~~
" }, "$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/BasicFinishedEntryDisplayTemplateSettings": { "caption": "Basic Finished Entry Display Template Settings", "created": "20141204052403400", "modified": "20141206181129389", "no_edit": "true", "title": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/BasicFinishedEntryDisplayTemplateSettings", "text": "" }, "$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/BasicTaskDisplayTemplate": { "caption": "Basic Task Display Template", "created": "20141204042612508", "deadline": "10 March 2525", "description": "An example template", "display_name": "Basic Display Template", "modified": "20141206181013421", "no_edit": "true", "settings_tiddler": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/BasicTaskDisplayTemplateSettings", "tags": "Templates ToDoEntryDisplayTemplate", "title": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/BasicTaskDisplayTemplate", "text": "<$checkbox tag="done"> <$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/> - <$view field="deadline"/>
<$view field="description"/>
" }, "$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/BasicTaskDisplayTemplateSettings": { "caption": "Basic Task Display Template Settings", "created": "20141204050404763", "modified": "20141206181038005", "no_edit": "true", "title": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/BasicTaskDisplayTemplateSettings", "text": "" }, "BasicTaskListTemplate": { "caption": "Basic List", "created": "20141204042704859", "display_name": "Basic List", "modified": "20141206181153765", "settings_tiddler": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/BasicTaskListTemplateSettings", "tags": "Templates TaskListTemplate", "title": "BasicTaskListTemplate", "text": "<$list filter=[tag[task]] template= {{Upgraded Task List!!entry_display_template}}> <$checkbox tag="done"> <$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/> - <$view field="deadline"/>
<$view field="blurb"/> " }, "$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/BasicTaskListTemplateSettings": { "caption": "Basic Task List Template Settings", "created": "20141204050410657", "modified": "20141206181212397", "no_edit": "true", "title": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/BasicTaskListTemplateSettings", "text": "" }, "$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/NewTaskButton": { "caption": "New Task Button", "created": "20141204020338680", "modified": "20141206181221933", "no_edit": "true", "tags": "", "title": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/NewTaskButton", "text": "<$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/state/NewTaskButton' text='show'> <$button set='$:/state/NewTaskButton' setTo='show'>Create New Task <$reveal type='match' state='$:/state/NewTaskButton' text='show'> <$button set='$:/state/NewTaskButton' setTo='noshow'>Hide Form <$button>Add Task <$action-setfield $tiddler={{$:/state/NewTask!!new_task_name}} due_date={{$:/state/NewTask!!due_date}} description={{$:/state/NewTask!!description}} text={{$:/state/NewTask!!text}} tags='task'/> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/NewTask' new_task_name='' due_date='' description='' text=''/>
Task Title: <$edit-text class='tc-edit-texteditor' tiddler='$:/state/NewTask' field='new_task_name' placeholder='Task Title'/>
Due Date: <$edit-text class='tc-edit-texteditor' tiddler='$:/state/NewTask' field='due_date' placeholder='Due Date'/>
Description: <$edit-text class='tc-edit-texteditor' tiddler='$:/state/NewTask' field='description' placeholder='Description'/>
<$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/state/NewTaskDetails' text='show'> <$button set='$:/state/NewTaskDetails' setTo='show'>Add Details <$reveal type='match' state='$:/state/NewTaskDetails' text='show'> Details: (<$button set='$:/state/NewTaskDetails' setTo='noshow'>Cancel)
<$edit-text class='tc-edit-texteditor' tiddler='$:/state/NewTask' field='text' placeholder='Task Details'/> " }, "NewTaskButtonSettings": { "caption": "New Task Button Settings", "created": "20141204033141546", "modified": "20141206181237729", "no_edit": "true", "tags": "", "title": "NewTaskButtonSettings", "text": "This is going to control the configuration for the upgraded task list. It should control both the Create New Task button and how the tasks are displayed (normal list, in groups, show/hide completed tasks, show/hide a delete task button, etc.)" }, "$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/Task List Settings": { "blurb": "Settings for the upgraded task list", "caption": "Task List Settings", "created": "20141204041129441", "modified": "20141213052327846", "no_edit": "true", "tags": "[[Wiki Settings]]", "title": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/Task List Settings", "text": "!!Unfinished Task Display template to use: This is how each individual task will be displayed in the list
<$select tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/Upgraded Task List' field='entry_display_template'> <$list filter='[plugintiddlers[]tag[ToDoEntryDisplayTemplate]!has[draft.of]][tag[ToDoEntryDisplayTemplate]!has[draft.of]]'> <$tiddler tiddler={{$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/Upgraded Task List!!entry_display_template}}> <$transclude tiddler={{!!settings_tiddler}}/>
Preview:
<$tiddler tiddler={{$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/Upgraded Task List!!entry_display_template}}><$transclude/>
!!Finished Task Display template to use: This is the template used to generate the list of tasks, click on the name to see the template (How it looks changes based on the display template selected above).
<$select tiddler='Upgraded Task List' field='finished_task_list_template'> <$list filter='[plugintiddlers[]tag[ToDoEntryDisplayTemplate]!has[draft.of]][tag[ToDoEntryDisplayTemplate]!has[draft.of]]'> <$tiddler tiddler={{$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/Upgraded Task List!!finished_task_list_template}}> <$transclude tiddler={{!!settings_tiddler}}/>
Preview:
<$tiddler tiddler={{$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/Upgraded Task List!!finished_task_list_template}}> <$transclude/>
!!Unfinished Task List template to use: This is the template used to generate the list of tasks, click on the name to see the template (How it looks changes based on the display template selected above).
<$select tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/Upgraded Task List' field='task_list_template'> <$list filter='[plugintiddlers[]tag[TaskListTemplate]!has[draft.of]][tag[TaskListTemplate]!has[draft.of]]'> <$tiddler tiddler={{$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/Upgraded Task List!!task_list_template}}> <$transclude tiddler={{!!settings_tiddler}}/>
Preview:
<$tiddler tiddler={{$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/Upgraded Task List!!task_list_template}}> <$transclude/>
!!Finished Task List template to use: This is the template used to generate the list of tasks, click on the name to see the template (How it looks changes based on the display template selected above).
<$select tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/Upgraded Task List' field='task_list_template'> <$list filter='[plugintiddlers[]tag[TaskListTemplate]!has[draft.of]][tag[TaskListTemplate]!has[draft.of]]'> <$tiddler tiddler={{$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/Upgraded Task List!!finished_task_list_template}}> <$transclude tiddler={{!!settings_tiddler}}/>
Preview:
<$tiddler tiddler={{$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/Upgraded Task List!!finished_task_list_template}}> <$transclude/>
" }, "$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/Task List": { "caption": "Task List", "created": "20141204203125231", "modified": "20141206181601566", "no_edit": "true", "tags": "", "title": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/Task List", "text": "<$transclude tiddler=NewTaskButton/> ! Outstanding tasks <$list filter="[!has[draft.of]tag[task]!tag[done]sort[created]!title[TiddlerTaskTemplate]]" template={{!!entry_display_template}}> <$checkbox tag="done"> <$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/> - <$view field="deadline"/>
<$view field="blurb"/> ! Completed tasks <$list filter="[!has[draft.of]tag[task]tag[done]sort[created]]" template={{!!list_template}} template={{!!finished_task_display_template}}> " }, "$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/Upgraded Task List": { "caption": "Task List", "created": "20141204015857343", "entry_display_template": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/BasicTaskDisplayTemplate", "finished_task_display_template": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/BasicFinishedEntryDisplayTemplate", "finished_task_list_template": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/BasicFinishedEntryDisplayTemplate", "modified": "20141206181652561", "no_edit": "true", "tags": "Dashboard", "task_list_template": "BasicTaskListTemplate", "title": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/TaskList/Upgraded Task List", "text": "<>" } } }
name: TaskList
